Notable Achievements

  • 2007: Wasatch Front 100 - DFL (35:57:08)
  • 2014: Last Great Race and Grand Slam
  • 2015: Angeles Crest 100 - Eagle Award (10 Consecutive Finishes)
  • 2019: San Diego 100 - Most Finishes (13)
